admin/taxjar.title: TaxJar
admin/taxjar.saveSettings.failure: Settings could not be saved, see console for details
admin/taxjar.settings.introduction: If you have a TaxJar account, visit this link to learn how to get an API token: {tokenLink}{lineBreak}If you want to sign up for TaxJar, visit this link: {signupLink}
admin/taxjar.settings.apiToken.label: TaxJar API token
admin/taxjar.settings.isLive.label: Production mode
admin/taxjar.settings.isLive.helpText: Disable this toggle if using a sandbox API key.
admin/taxjar.settings.enableTaxCalculati: WARNING: Changing this setting may break your checkout. Make sure to test.
admin/taxjar.settings.enableTransactionP: If this toggle is enabled, any invoiced orders where this account acts as the seller will be posted to TaxJar.
